0001.name: Merchant of the Deep
0001.mfx: When you draw two or more cards at the same time; you can draw one additional card.
0001.afx: You can discard one blue card; draw two cards.

0002.name: Tiger Lily
0002.mfx: After this card attacks; its ATK gets decreased by 1.
0002.efx: Any unit that attacks the equipped card takes 1 damage after damage calculation.

0003.name: Martian Hunter
0003.mfx: If this unit destroys a unit by battle; it gains 1 ATK.
0003.afx: If you control a WARRIOR unit, target a WARRIOR unit you control and one of your opponent's units; destroy both of them.

0004.name: Yo-Yo-Yo
0004.mfx: After this card battles and it is not destroyed; return it to the hand, then you can play one card that has stats totalling 3 or less from your hand as a unit. Its effects are negated and it is destroyed at the end of your turn.
0004.afx: You can discard one card; play this card as a unit.
